tutorial-modal.menu-content: You can slide the menu to the left or right to access the variety of tools.
tutorial-modal.graph-handle-content: You can drag this handle to shift graph vertically. Double click to reset position.
tutorial-modal.divider-content: You can drag this divider to change the size of the graph.
tutorial-modal.pwa-content: modernGraphTool is built as a progressive web app (PWA). You can install it to your device for full-app experience.
tutorial-modal.pwa-inst-ios: On Safari: Tap the Share button, then select 'Add to Home Screen'.
tutorial-modal.pwa-inst-android: On Chrome: Tap the menu button (three dots), then select 'Install app' or 'Add to Home screen'.
